channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Police fan out to Providence schools to calm worries with the Brown University shooter still loose
item.description: Additional police have been sent to Providence schools to reassure worried parents that their kids will be safe with the Brown University shooter on the loose and no indication yet that investigators have zeroed in on a specific suspect in the weekend attack.

item.title: Brown University shooting leaves students, community frustrated with official response
Brown mourns the loss of an aspiring doctor and campus leader to the campus attack
